TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
Hey! I had that Minotaur right where I wanted him.

Did you find anything?

Actually, yes. It seems that a group of Minotaurs has been through here. They used some sort of device or machine to capture the Dragons and take them north.

We have to go after them!

I agree. I am tracking groups of my own people who have been taken north. I don't believe in coincidence. These events are related. I'm certain of it.

Then I'll come with you. If these Minotaurs can capture fully grown Dragons, you're going to need some help. No offense, but you're kind of puny-looking...
